1.name: Sigurd
1.text: (Every year, I sign up for this event.)

5.name: Sigurd
5.text: (It’s not my fault! It just happens!)

6.name: Sigurd
6.text: (Global Game Jam is done for the year, and all the other groups are presenting)

7.name: Sigurd
7.text: (but all I can concentrate on is the screen in front of me and my team members about to pass out from stress.)

8.name: Sigurd
8.text: (We’re going to present soon, and what do we have? Not even the menu works!)
